Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • it.polimi.se2018.network.server.Room
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Room
extends java.lang.Thread
    A process that puts in communication various clients, creates the Model, the Controller and the VirtualView.

      • reconnectPlayer

        public java.lang.Boolean reconnectPlayer(ClientInterface clientInterface,
                                         int id)
        Called by the dispatcher when a client tries to reconnect. Notifies the model about the riconnection.
        Parameters:
        clientInterface - interface of the client that wants to reconnect
        id - id of the player that is trying to reconnect
        Returns:
        true if the clients is able to reconnect, false otherwise
